description: The Devotional Blindness instills in the Boombot a deep and illusory conviction that their sacrifice represents a true honor for the Mechanized Confederation. This fervent devotion and sense of altruism motivate the Boombot to redouble their efforts in combat and enhance the power of their honorable implosion.
tooltip: Increases Boombots damages + 10, range + 5 and laser resistance + 2.
